description: Refactor share button placement in SubmissionLightbox for improved layout consistency. Moved the share button to a new position directly left of the Close button while maintaining functionality and tooltip support.
Make the buttons that appear on the lightbox more consistent and add support for critiques and sharing in the lightbox
Implement slide transition for submission lightbox with iOS compatibility
Symlink skills from .agents to other llms configs

Refactor share button components to unify functionality and improve code maintainability. Removed individual share button components for collections, portfolios, and profiles, replacing them with a single ShareButton component that handles different types of shares. Updated relevant pages to utilize the new ShareButton, ensuring consistent sharing behavior across the application.
